posts.post_content: Well, it is and instant. You can play it on their turn and fog or remove or just block some stuff and attack with a 6/12 next turn before it blows up... or you can [Soul's Fire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Soul's Fire) some face too whenever you want :P

Posted By: singaz (1/30/2010 3:41:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Remember, guys, you can use this on an opponent's attack to block and kill some creature (\*\*\*uming it has 6 or less toughness); since it dies at the end of YOUR turn (check it!), you get to attack with the 6/12 trampler as soon as your turn comes up, since it didn't come into play during your turn!!   
It doesn't have haste, so casting it in response to your attackers will usually mean it just dies as your turn ends--and since you're already attacking, that wouldn't matter, anyway
posts.html:
